Judicial Yellow Boo United States Court of Federal Claims 523 nited States Courts of .imited Jurisdiction nited States Court of Federal Claims onal Courts Building, 717 Madison Place, NW, Ashington, BC 20005 (202) 357-6400 ernet: www.uscfc.uscourts. gov mber of Judgeships: 16 , @ United States Court of Federal Claims, formerly known as the United Siates Claims Court, has jurisdiction over claims seeking money judgments gainst the United States. A claim must be founded upon the United _ ates Constitution; an act of Congress; the regulation of an executive department; an express or implied-in-fact contract with the United States, ‘ar damages, liquidated or unliquidated, in cases not sounding in tort. ppeals are to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit. All judges on the court are appointed by the President, with Senate consent, for 15-year terms. The chief judge is.selected by the President to serve until the age of seventy or until another chief judge is chosen. Retirees may serve as senior judges on assigned cases.
